title: Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for ...
body:
Almost 1 time out of 2, when I run Psalm, I get this error:

```
$ vendor/bin/psalm
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for example\view\activityview in /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:42
Stack trace:
#0 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/Method/AtomicMethodCallAnalyzer.php(162): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get()
#1 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/MethodCallAnalyzer.php(182): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\Method\AtomicMethodCallAnalyzer::analyze()
#2 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(144): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\MethodCallAnalyzer::analyze()
#3 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(39): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::handleExpression()
#4 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/AssignmentAnalyzer.php(194): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::analyze()
#5 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(125): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\AssignmentAnalyzer::analyze()
#6 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(39): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::handleExpression()
#7 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(519): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::analyze()
#8 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(169): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer::analyzeStatement()
#9 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Block/LoopAnalyzer.php(202): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer->analyze()
#10 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Block/ForeachAnalyzer.php(304): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Block\LoopAnalyzer::analyze()
#11 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(479): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Block\ForeachAnalyzer::analyze()
#12 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(169): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer::analyzeStatement()
#13 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/FileAnalyzer.php(188): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer->analyze()
#14 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(341): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\FileAnalyzer->analyze()
#15 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(580): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->Psalm\Internal\Codebase\{closure}()
#16 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(270): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->doAnalysis()
#17 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(634): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->analyzeFiles()
#18 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/psalm.php(675): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->check()
#19 /home/benjamin/Projects/example.com/vendor/vimeo/psalm/psalm(2): require_once('/home/benjamin/...')
#20 {main}
(Psalm 4.0.1@b1e2e30026936ef8d5bf6a354d1c3959b6231f44 crashed due to an uncaught Throwable)
```

A `vendor/bin/psalm --clear-cache` always fixes the issue, but it gets really annoying.

Any idea what could be causing this?
